txt.en:
'Greetings. You say the Lady Lothíriel sent you? I am not sure if this means she trusts you or wishes to punish you.'

The knight chuckles slightly to themself.

'Oh, it's nothing so bad... it just might not be the most enjoyable of tasks. You see, we were successful in driving the invading Corsairs out of Hashadir, but while they fled, they left behind a most undesirable surprise - rats. Rats of the most unusual size, even. Who knew rats could grow so large?

'In any case, our tasks here in Dol Amroth have kept us from cleaning them out, but if you are willing to do so, there is a reward.'
The vermin who have taken up residence at Hashadir stand to pose a serious threat to the citizens of Dol Amroth.
You should let Abartârik know that you defeated many rats at Hashadir.\n\nAbartârik is in Dol Amroth outside of the Swan-knight's Keep.

'Though my father has returned to the governance of Dol Amroth, I am still much involved in seeing to the city's many duties and tasks. One of those tasks is receiving daily reports from our swan-knights who patrol the countryside.\n
